description: The Department of National Defence seeks Project Planner infrastructure (Senior) services to provide support the acquisition of aircrafts infrastructure planification for the STTC Project.
tags: Canada ,Project Management Services ,National Capital Region ,World Trade Organization , Government Procurement ,Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement ,Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement ,Trade Agreement
full_summary:
### Project Management Services

**Reference Number**: PW-23-01023529
**Solicitation Number**: W847A-230352

**Title and Description**: The Department of National Defence is seeking a Project Planner (Senior) to provide infrastructure planning services in support of the acquisition of aircrafts. This requirement is open to suppliers under the framework of the E60ZT-18TSPS/D Supply Arrangement for Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) .

**Background**: The intention is to seek infrastructure planning services to support the infrastructure planification related to the acquisition of aircrafts. This project is expected to start in late-April 2023. The expected duration of the contract is up to 12 months but may be subject to extension based on the terms and conditions of the final contract.

**Key Information**

- **Request for Proposal**: The Notice Type is Request for Proposal, with a competitive and selective tendering method.
- **Trade Agreements**: This procurement is open to suppliers participating under various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement. 
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Suppliers must be based in the National Capital Region (NCR).
- **Currency**: The contract will be denominated in Canadian dollars.

**Tender Details**

- **Closing Date**: The tender closing date is February 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time.
- **Attachments**: The tender package includes two attachments:
  - [A project planner planner document (TSPS 25 Jan 23)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/dfa510599676d90e7d4099efd4d4b99e/npp_francais_attachment_2_project_planner_tsps_25_jan_23.docx)
  - [Project planner planner document (TSPS 25 Jan 23)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/30/a27f3c9f5a7ad3b94cd25cc1f7d15081/npp_english_attachment_1_project_planner_tsps_25_jan_23.docx)

**Contact Information**

- **Simon Boutin**: 343-572-1354, [simon.boutin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:simon.boutin@forces.gc.ca)
